messages.message:
Yes, I think versioning private endpoints isn’t necessary. However, I do think they should use openapi, just like the public endpoints, because that will make it easier to make them public one day if needed.

Anyway, thanks all! I’ll update a few proposals I have going to use /private.

one idea: we can enforce this separation by allowing oauth based only on the /api/v endpoints
no oauth token based auth on the private endpoints

currently all endpoints in api-server support oauth token based auth I think
